title: Soo as I saw if you buy project skin you got icon for free????
body: I did not got the icon anyone else with the same problem?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

The icons are not included with the purchase of a PROJECT skin, they are sold separately in the store for RP.

Do you guys think you can add a limited availability option to summoner icons? I get so stressed when I'm not sure if the icons are gonna stay or not. So what I'm asking is:
1. Is the project Icons gonna be have an expire date fairly soon?
2. Do you think you can add a "limited availability" option to summoner icons? It can't be hard right? For godsake YOU HAVE LIMITED AVAILABILITY FOR RUNES BUT NOT FOR SUMMONER ICONS!?

I'm not sure about adding the limited availability option, but I can bring it up to the store team. That said, if something is limited/legacy, it's generally announced on the League of Legends website (there's an article announcing the content, and providing information such as pricing, availability, etc.)

The PROJECT skins/icons are not legacy, so they'll be sticking around.
All of them? Thank god! Katey, Katey, Katey, Katey. I feel so reliefed right now. Thank you :3
I see I got it wrong my bad.

They come free in the bundle, but not with any individual skin.

I think.
Riot never said anywhere that you get the icons for free if you buy the skin. You have to buy the icons separately.

You don't get the icons for buying the skins. 
You can buy the icons seperately for 250 RP each.
where did you see this? im interested about this!
i think the icons are seperate
